snippet: Ronnie Brewer, the Knicks’ likely starter at shooting guard, will be out for six weeks after undergoing arthroscopic knee surgery.
abstract: New York Knicks shooting guard Ronnie Brewer will miss six weeks because of knee surgery; other basketball items noted.
lead_paragraph: Ronnie Brewer, the Knicks’ likely starter at shooting guard, will be out for six weeks after undergoing arthroscopic knee surgery.

headline.seo: Knicks’ Ronnie Brewer Out for Six Weeks
headline.main: Knicks’ Brewer Out for Six Weeks
